titleStmt.title: A mirrhor mete for all mothers, matrones, and maidens, intituled the Mirrhor of Modestie no lesse profitable and pleasant, then necessarie to bee read and practiced.
titleStmt.author: Salter, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Kingston] for Edward White, at the little Northdore of Paules at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Includes: A pretie pithie dialogue betwene Mercurie, &c. Vertue. Made by T.S., with caption title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
